title: Destiny in Alice
brief_description: In the heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

description: In the heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.
